presentation: Hi, my name is Thomas and I'm a fullstack web-developer.

summary.paragraph1: I am a dedicated web developer with expertise in creating responsive, user-friendly websites and dynamic applications. Proficient in technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB, I specialize in both front-end and back-end development.
summary.paragraph2: My focus is on delivering optimized, SEO-friendly solutions tailored to meet each client’s unique needs. Whether it’s a static website for a small business or a dynamic application, I thrive on turning ideas into polished digital experiences.
